com.microsoft.rest

Class RestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.rest.RestClient

  • public final class RestClient
extends Object
    An instance of this class stores the client information for making REST calls.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RestClient.Builder
      The builder class for building a REST client.

      • baseUrl

        public String baseUrl()
        Get the base URL currently set. If it's a customizable URL, the updated URL instead of the raw one might be returned.
        Returns:
        the base URL. <<<<<<< HEAD
        See Also:

      • setBaseUrl

        public void setBaseUrl(String... replacements)
        Handles dynamic replacements on base URL. The arguments must be in pairs with the string in raw URL to replace as replacements[i] and the dynamic part as replacements[i+1]. E.g. {subdomain}.microsoft.com can be set dynamically by calling setBaseUrl("{subdomain}", "azure").
        Parameters:
        replacements - the string replacements in pairs.

      • credentials

        public ServiceClientCredentials credentials()
        Get the credentials attached to this REST client.
        Returns:
        the credentials.
